monsters.name: Blink Dog
monsters.languages: Blink Dog, understands Sylvan but can't speak it

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

actions.name: Teleport (Recharge 4-6)
actions.desc: The dog magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 40 ft. to an unoccupied space it can see. Before or after teleporting, the dog can make one bite attack.

special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
special_abilities.desc: The dog has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

actions.name: Tusk
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) slashing damage.

special_abilities.name: Charge
special_abilities.desc: If the boar moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a tusk attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 3 (1d6) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 11 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

special_abilities.name: Relentless (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
special_abilities.desc: If the boar takes 7 damage or less that would reduce it to 0 hit points, it is reduced to 1 hit point instead.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Constrict
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends, the creature is restrained, and the snake can't constrict another target.

actions.name: Ram
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one prone creature. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

special_abilities.name: Charge
special_abilities.desc: If the elk moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Sling
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

special_abilities.name: Keen Smell
special_abilities.desc: The erina has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

special_abilities.name: Hardy
special_abilities.desc: The erina has advantage on saving throws against poison.

special_abilities.name: Spines
special_abilities.desc: An enemy who hits the erina with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The badger makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (2d4 + 1) slashing damage.

special_abilities.name: Keen Smell
special_abilities.desc: The badger has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Echolocation
special_abilities.desc: The bat can't use its blindsight while deafened.

special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing
special_abilities.desc: The bat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 11). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the frog can't bite another target.

actions.name: Swallow
actions.desc: The frog makes one bite attack against a Small or smaller target it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. The swallowed target is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the frog, and it takes 5 (2d4) acid damage at the start of each of the frog's turns. The frog can have only one target swallowed at a time. If the frog dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse using 5 ft. of movement, exiting prone.

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: The frog can breathe air and water

special_abilities.name: Standing Leap
special_abilities.desc: The frog's long jump is up to 20 ft. and its high jump is up to 10 ft., with or without a running start.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Variant: Hold Breath
special_abilities.desc: The lizard can hold its breath for 15 minutes. (A lizard that has this trait also has a swimming speed of 30 feet.)

special_abilities.name: Variant: Spider Climb
special_abilities.desc: The lizard can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

monsters.name: Giant Owl
monsters.languages: Giant Owl, understands Common, Elvish, and Sylvan but can't speak

actions.name: Talons
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d6 + 1) slashing damage.

special_abilities.name: Flyby
special_abilities.desc: The owl doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
special_abilities.desc: The owl has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monsters.name: Giant Wolf Spider
monsters.senses: blindsight 10 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 13

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 7 (2d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

special_abilities.name: Spider Climb
special_abilities.desc: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

special_abilities.name: Web Sense
special_abilities.desc: While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

special_abilities.name: Web Walker
special_abilities.desc: The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Nimble Escape
special_abilities.desc: The goblin can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

special_abilities.name: Keen Smell
special_abilities.desc: The panther has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

special_abilities.name: Pounce
special_abilities.desc: If the panther moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the panther can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

monsters.name: Pseudodragon
monsters.senses: blindsight 10 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 13
monsters.languages: understands Common and Draconic but can't speak

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Sting
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned for 1 hour. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target falls unconscious for the same duration, or until it takes damage or another creature uses an action to shake it awake.

special_abilities.name: Keen Senses
special_abilities.desc: The pseudodragon has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight, hearing, or smell.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The pseudodragon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Limited Telepathy
special_abilities.desc: The pseudodragon can magically communicate simple ideas, emotions, and images telepathically with any creature within 100 ft. of it that can understand a language.

special_abilities.name: Variant: Familiar
special_abilities.desc: The pseudodragon can serve another creature as a familiar, forming a magic, telepathic bond with that willing companion. While the two are bonded, the companion can sense what the pseudodragon senses as long as they are within 1 mile of each other. While the pseudodragon is within 10 feet of its companion, the companion shares the pseudodragon's Magic Resistance trait. At any time and for any reason, the pseudodragon can end its service as a familiar, ending the telepathic bond.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 slashing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 40/160 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned for 1 minute. If its saving throw result is 5 or lower, the poisoned target falls unconscious for the same duration, or until it takes damage or another creature takes an action to shake it awake.

actions.name: Heart Sight
actions.desc: The sprite touches a creature and magically knows the creature's current emotional state. If the target fails a DC 10 Charisma saving throw, the sprite also knows the creature's alignment. Celestials, fiends, and undead automatically fail the saving throw.

actions.name: Invisibility
actions.desc: The sprite magically turns invisible until it attacks or casts a spell, or until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the sprite wears or carries is invisible with it.

actions.name: Sew
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage, and the suturefly sews the target's mouth, nose, or eye closed. With supernatural speed, the suturefly repeatedly pierces the target's face, each time threading a loop of the target's own skin through the previous hole. These skin loops rapidly blacken, shrink, and draw the orifice tightly closed. It takes two actions and a sharp blade to sever the loops and reopen the orifice, and the process causes intense pain and 2 slashing damage. A victim whose mouth and nose have been sewn shut begins suffocating at the start of his or her next turn.

special_abilities.name: Camouflage
special_abilities.desc: A suturefly in forest surroundings has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

special_abilities.name: Detect Blasphemy
special_abilities.desc: The most common variety of suturefly attacks any creature that blasphemes aloud, which it can detect at a range of 100 feet unless the blasphemer makes a successful DC 13 Charisma saving throw.

monsters.name: Swarm of Ravens
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned

actions.name: Beaks
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target in the swarm's space. Hit: 7 (2d6) piercing damage, or 3 (1d6) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

special_abilities.name: Swarm
special_abilities.desc: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny raven. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

actions.name: Reshape
actions.desc: The treacle assumes the shape of any tiny creature or object. A reshaped treacle gains the movement of its new form but no other special qualities.

actions.name: Blood Drain (1/hour)
actions.desc: A treacle touching the skin of a warm-blooded creature inflicts 4 (1d8) necrotic damage per hour of contact, and the victim's maximum hit points are reduced by the same number. Blood is drained so slowly that the victim doesn't notice the damage unless he or she breaks contact with the treacle (sets it down or hands it to someone else, for example). When contact is broken, the victim notices blood on his or her skin or clothes with a successful DC 13 Wisdom (Perception) check.

special_abilities.name: Amorphous
special_abilities.desc: The treacle can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

special_abilities.name: Charming Presence
special_abilities.desc: The treacle has an uncanny ability to sense and to play off of another creature's emotions. It uses Charisma (Deception) to oppose Wisdom (Insight or Perception) skill checks made to see through its ruse, and it has advantage on its check.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 11 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
special_abilities.desc: The wolf has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics
special_abilities.desc: The wolf has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the wolf's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.
